metadata.title: CVE-2021-46950 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  md/raid1: properly indicate failure when ending a failed write request  This patch addresses a data corruption bug in raid1 arrays using bitmaps. Without this fix, the bitmap bits for the failed I/O end up being cleared.  Since we are in the failure leg of raid1_end_write_request, the request either needs to be retried (R1BIO_WriteError) or failed (R1BIO_Degraded).
